name: 天地神殿・Tenchi Shinden
description:
This game was created in three (3) days, during SAMJam21. For more information, please visit Vagabonddog's blog post about the jam here.

As a ninja-in-training, you always respected your sensei; However, one fateful day, she taught you the power of 天地 (Tenchi).

With this power in-hand, and a thirst for adventure, you set out for your closest training temple, 天地神殿 (Tenchi Shinden), to truly harness your new power.

What events will unfold as you explore the depths and ruins of this pre-ancient temple, trying to reclaim the lost 交換結晶 (Koukan Crystal)? Only time will tell.
